divs: Sighting DetailsI observed 2 ufos at the same time, one was a disc with a somewhat coiled snake trail with red and blue lights and the other was boomerang shaped. When I arrived at work I showed my boss and we both took pics and video and compared them they was exactly the same. I didnt want to report anymore but I thought they would go away.
Summary: took puppy out before work and observed 1 ufo on the left side of the moon and the other one was over the pa line
